mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(NOTICEnum, notice, title, content, AdminNum, reg_date) VALUES(#{noticeNum}, #{notice}, #{title}, #{content}, #{adminNum}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT n.NOTICEnum, notice, n.AdminNum, title, nickName, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') reg_date, NVL(fileCount, 0) fileCount FROM notice n JOIN member1 m ON n.AdminNum = m.userNum LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT NOTICEnum, COUNT(*) fileCount FROM noticeFile GROUP BY NOTICEnum ) f ON n.NOTICEnum=f.NOTICEnum WHERE notice = 1 ORDER BY NOTICEnum DESC
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM notice n JOIN member1 m ON n.AdminNum = m.userNum

SELECT n.NOTICEnum, notice, n.AdminNum, title, reg_date, nickName, NVL(fileCount, 0) fileCount FROM notice n JOIN member1 m ON n.AdminNum = m.userNum LEFT OUTER JOIN( SELECT NOTICEnum, COUNT(*) fileCount FROM noticeFile GROUP BY NOTICEnum ) f ON n.NOTICEnum = f.NOTICEnum
ORDER BY NOTICEnum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
SELECT NOTICEnum, n.AdminNum, title, content, reg_date, notice, nickName FROM notice n JOIN member1 m ON n.AdminNum = m.userNum WHERE NOTICEnum = #{noticeNum}

SELECT NOTICEnum, title FROM notice n JOIN member1 m ON n.AdminNum = m.UserNum
AND (NOTICEnum > #{noticeNum})
ORDER BY NOTICEnum ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT NOTICEnum, title FROM notice n JOIN member1 m ON n.AdminNum = m.UserNum
AND (NOTICEnum < #{noticeNum})
ORDER BY NOTICEnum DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET title = #{title}, content=#{content}, notice=#{notice} WHERE NOTICEnum=#{noticeNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO noticeFile(NfileNum, NOTICEnum, saveFilename, originalFilename) VALUES(noticeFile_seq.NEXTVAL, #{noticeNum}, #{saveFilename}, #{originalFilename})
